resources: Tourist Attractions in Lombok About Us Tourist Attractions in Lombok // Layout Choose to view pictures List of Tourist Attractions Back Beach Hill Waterfall Beach List Hill List Waterfall List // Data pantai Pink Beach Sourt Beach A beautiful stretch of pink sandy beach with a dazzling mix of green trees Turtle Beach Ekas, Jerowaru The iconic beach with turtle-like stones is still very original Penyisok Beach Jerowaru A beach with high cliffs with stunning big waves Semeti Beach Lombok Tengah Distinctive beach with iconic rocks // Data bukit Nanggi Hill Sembalun Lawang A hill that has long been a prima donna with a dazzling stretch of green grass Pall Jepang Hill Sepit Suela, Lotim A hill that is like a land above the clouds Anak Dara Hill Sembalun, Lombok Timur The hill in the middle of Sembalun Village Sempana Hill Sembalun Bumbung, Lombok Timur The hill is quite high and is included in the Seven Summits of Sembalun // Data air terjun Skeper Waterfall Santong, KLU Is the highest waterfall in Lombok Benang Kelambu Waterfall Batu Kliang, Loteng This waterfall is similar to a curtain which in the Sasak language is called a mosquito net Tiu Kelep Waterfall Senaru,Lombok Utara This waterfall which is under the foot of Mount Rinjani offers natural beauty that is still beautiful Jeruk Manis Waterfall Tete Batu, Lotim The waterfall in the middle of the forest offers a view that is still very beautiful and cool
